titles.title: Fox-Wisconsin River National Heritage Corridor Study Act of 1993

A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to determine the suitability and feasibility of designating the Fox and Lower Wisconsin River corridors in the State of Wisconsin as a National Heritage Corridor, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1457)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of the Interior, and Office of Management and Budget.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 103-16.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 30.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

bill.summary: 2/4/1993--Introduced. Fox-Wisconsin River National Heritage Corridor Study Act of 1993 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to study and report to specified congressional committees on the suitability and feasibility of designating the Fox and Lower Wisconsin River corridors in Wisconsin as a National Heritage Corridor. Establishes the Fox-Wisconsin River Study Advisory Commission. Directs the Commission to submit annual activity reports to the Secretary and the Governor of Wisconsin. Terminates the Commission upon study completion. Authorizes appropriations.
